title: Crime Scene Cover-Up
description: From USA TODAY bestselling author Sharon Dunn. Facing the past is the only way to catch a killer. After years of chasing the Arson Killer, FBI profiler Arielle Olson follows the trail straight back to the scene of her husband’s death—and into the murderer’s sights. Now she must rely on Sheriff Neil Cobain…even if she suspects he’s withholding info about the night she was left widowed. And they must put aside the past long enough to end a killer’s deadly game.From Love Inspired Courage. Danger. Faith.
author: Sharon Dunn
